customer_addr:
ZOOAMERICA NORTH AMERICAN WILDLIFE PARK
100 W HERSHEYPARK DRIVE
HERSHEY, PA 17033

citations.narrative:
There were at least 2 prairie dogs that were killed by predation. On 3/6/25 a prairie dog was found deceased in the
enclosure with puncture wounds to the abdomen. Necropsy results were consistent with trauma due to abdominal
wounds. On 3/19/25 a mink was observed dragging a dead prairie dog. The body was not recovered. The mink was
trapped and removed from the enclosure on 4/9/25. Two groundhogs were also trapped and removed. There were 7 total
prairie dogs prior to these incidents and only 2 prairie dogs have been observed for the last several months so it is
possible 3 additional prairie dogs were lost to predation. The prairie dog enclosure is a large circular area of dirt and grass
with a short cement wall and a metal bar that can easily be entered by predators such as mink or groundhogs.
Failure to construct enclosures to prevent entrance of predators may result in injury or death to the animals.
The housing facilities must be maintained to protect the animals from injury.
Correct by: Preventing injury to the animals by predators from August 6, 2025 forward
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Critical

Failure to construct enclosures to prevent entrance of predators may result in injury or death to the animals. 
The housing facilities must be maintained to protect the animals from injury.

This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
